title: Placed in gold 2 then placed in silver 4 ?
body: Is the flex queue just completely broken or what ?? Went 7/3 and got placed in gold 2, played a few more and all of a sudden I'm placed in silver 4 wtff ?? Has this happened to anyone else ?

replies.body: yea happened to me too 7/3 silver 1 played till 86 points lose a game and got placed in silver 5 0 points, after playing 40 games lol
Yeah same position... After one game from b2 to b5, I dont get it
I had the same issue just then, got placed in s4, played over 42 games and got into g5 then I get the message that I have been placed a second time into silver 5.
I got placed into s5 which is my elo, but just now I got placed into B3 after I was already placed. I have no idea whats goin on
I was plat 5, went 7/3 and dropped to Gold 3, played one more game the day after (today) and dropped to Silver 2. Biggest bs
Yea pretty much same here, played one game then got dropped to silver 4, what the actual f

Same thing happened to me. 6/4 Gold 2. Dropped to gold 3 because. Made it back to gold2 was on 60 LP. Then this new ranked came out played the game. 2/2/20 on bard was expecting somewhere the same. Gold 2-  gold 5. Nope silver 2 for me. I was plat 5 in season 6.

~~ It's a known ongoing issue, updates here: ~~

~~ http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues-update ~~
